mapper.select: select b.no,u.name, b.id, u.img, b.content, b.img1, b.hashtag, b.regdate,b.up, (select count(*) from reply where no = b.no) as reply_cnt from user1 u inner join board1 b on u.id=b.id where b.prv=0 order by b.no desc
select no from (select * from board1 order by no desc) where rownum=1

select b.no , u.name, u.id, u.img, b.content, b.img1, b.hashtag, b.regdate,b.up, (select count(*) from reply where no = b.no) as reply_cnt from board1 b, follows f, user1 u where b.id=u.id and f.following_id = u.id and b.prv<=1 and f.id=#{id} order by b.regdate desc
select b.no, u.name, b.id, b.up, b.prv, u.img, b.content, b.img1, b.img2, b.img3, b.hashtag, b.regdate from user1 u inner join board1 b on u.id=b.id where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update board1 set content=#{content}, hashtag=#{hashtag}, img1=#{img1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img2=#{img2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img3=#{img3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no=#{no}
